entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allowing SortedDictionary.Remove while enumerating #108374
  • [API Proposal]: Task manager #108372
  • [API Proposal]: `I*Iterator<TSource>` #108371
  • GetOrAllocateThreadPoolBoundHandle is too slow in certain use case #108363
  • "Enhanced precision" of DateTimeOffset Add methods results in incorrect value #108362
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408.cmd #108361
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408.cmd #108360

Closed

  • NET 9.0 RC2 NativeLibrary.Load crashes #107993
  • Why does ImmutableList throw IndexOutOfRangeException instead of ArgumentOutOfRangeException when getting the element of the set at the given index? #108359
  • Why Dotnet call syslog(using DllImport("libc")) slower than Java(using Native.loadLibrary("c"))? #107393
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ComObject.CreateInstance for ComWrappers #106912
    Future
  • Do ComWrappers support proxies well? #101909
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify pthread_setname_np usage #108370
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expand an optimization for short values to IgnoreCase in single-value SearchValues<string> #108368
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] fix the building error for "PalInterlockedCompareExchange128" #108364
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64

Merged

  • NativeAOT Thread Name #107943
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix AbandonedMutexException errors in System.Memory tests #108369
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0

Updated

  • [mono] Re-enable HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS for non-amd64 Mono #107358
    NO-MERGE, arch-arm64, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #108235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • JIT: use bbID for pred list ordering #108357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Root the System.Runtime EventSource #108348
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet7 packages are still available for installation in Ubuntu 22.04 but they're broken #43785
  • [NETSDKE2E] With 9.0.100-rtm SDK installed, Warning: "Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload version 9.0.100-rtm.24477.19 was not found.." happens when installing maui workload. #43777

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43759
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix baseline manifest version for RTM branding #43737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add missing conditions for illumos #43775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2548860 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR input binding fails to parse Authorization header #58148
  • Adding IdentityUserClaim navigation property to ApplicationUser causes migration to create new FK #58147
  • SignalR JS client incorrectly appends Authorization header #58146

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #58142
  • Meia Cassandra Leaked Video Trending Scandal ON Social Media Twitter X #58143
  • HD.VIRAL Fiona Cauley Snapchat Leaked Video Trending ON Social Media #58144
  • NOW VIRAL Camilla Araujo Snapchat Leaked Video Trending ON Social Media #58145
  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext #58139
  • Can't create development certificate on macOS Catalina #19590
    Backlog

PullRequests

    community-contribution, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Performance] CollectionView slow first render #24994
  • GetBinding() #24992
  • In MacCatalyst App Email.Default.IsComposeSupported always returns false in macOS!!! #24991
  • Shell TabBar is slow to open for the first time when combined with Grid and Border #24987
  • MAUI 8.0.82 raises on Android Javax.Crypto.AEADBadTagException #24986

Closed

  • Error Failed to AOT compile aot-instances.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 139 - MacCatalyst Release Config #24988
  • Distribute to Mac AppStore The instaler package includes files that are only readable by the root user..... #24989

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Custom back button image color #24993
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990
    community ✨

Updated

  • Fix DatePicker slow first render (#24929) #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
